dcterms:creator: Boaz Shmueli
Lun-Wei Ku
dcterms:description: A dataset built from 40,000 two-turn Twitter threads, split into three parts: 32,000 samples with gold labels for training, 4,000 unlabeled samples for practice, and 4,000 unlabeled samples for final evaluation. Each sample includes the text of the original tweet and the reply text, with training samples containing the MP4-format file and the category of the GIF response, selected from a list of 43 categories.
dcterms:title: EmotionGIF 2020
